title: In case of properties situated in the layout and owned by MHADA/Land owning public authority, a certificate from MHADA or land owning public authority certifying that minimum 51% of the certified and legal occupants of the property have granted consent in favour of developer
clause_text: In case of properties situated in the layout and owned by MHADA/Land owning public authority, a certificate from MHADA or land owning public authority certifying that minimum 51% of the certified and legal occupants of the property have granted consent in favour of developer.
